name: Kelir
body:
### About
Kelir is a 2D animation software written in C++, using [Qt](http://qt.digia.com/) as its base application framework. Current development goal is a simple, easy to use, vector-based animation software.

### Documentation
So far, there's only a [short technical note](/docs/technote.pdf) that gives an overview of current state and planned development of Kelir. Its sole purpose is to help familiarize newcomer to Kelir's codebase.

### Authors
Kelir's main developer at this moment is me, Adhi Hargo (@adhihargo). I encourage you to contribute, or even fork this software as you see fit.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
